full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GSER ZHUN MA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RANG GI YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA AA CHI THU BLA MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHAR LAM DANG SLOB BU DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG GNYIS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN CHEN PAS YANG YANG BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR, YUL 'DIR GRAGS PA'I PHYAG SROL LTAR BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GIS BGYIS SO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE MING CAN,
